channel.title: Help on safezone
channel.description:
hi, i got a (noob) question so my whole client is pvp but i want to creat safezones there r some in there (found the codes) but i dont rly undestand them =/ i dont know how to keep the safe zone to the area i want
this is the code i should be using : || (absX >= 3212 && absX <= 3215 && absY >= 3463 && absY <= 3461)
http://img246.imageshack.us/my.php?image=helper.png srry that i didnt do a photo up here i didnt seem to make it posibel =/ on the pic u see a table wich could help u explain it to me plz i made some false coords up for u to explain so plz help

item.title: Help on safezone
item.dc:creator: @vosenschaap vosenschaap
item.description:
@vosenschaap wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:4, topic:277380”]Just replace your code with what I gave you…

|| (absX >= 3212 && absX <= 3215 && absY >= 3461 && absY <= 3463)

but the code wasnt correct i wanne know how to do it myself i dont want som1 to make them for me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2009, 02:56:13 pm[/size][hr]som1 can help?

Read full topic

item.title: Help on safezone
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Just replace your code with what I gave you…

|| (absX >= 3212 && absX <= 3215 && absY >= 3461 && absY <= 3463)

Read full topic

item.title: Help on safezone
item.dc:creator: @vosenschaap vosenschaap
item.description:
@vosenschaap wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:277380”]How can Y be greater than 3463, but smaller than 3461? Change it to this -

|| (absX >= 3212 && absX <= 3215 && absY >= 3461 && absY <= 3463)

could u explain it with the picture cause i havent got any further with this =/

Read full topic

item.title: Help on safezone
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

How can Y be greater than 3463, but smaller than 3461? Change it to this -

|| (absX >= 3212 && absX <= 3215 && absY >= 3461 && absY <= 3463)
